verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H6697>strength,<s%> which <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7128>war,<s%> and my <S%H676>fingers<s%> to fight: <S%H4421><s%>

My <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress;<s%> my high <S%H4869>tower,<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> my <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and he in whom I <S%H2620>trust;<s%> who <S%H7286>subdueth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> me.
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H120>man,<s%> that thou takest <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of him! or the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H582>man,<s%> that thou makest <S%H2803>account<s%> of him!
Man <S%H120><s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> to <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> that passeth <S%H5674>away.<s%>
Bow <S%H5186><s%> thy <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and come <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they shall <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
Cast <S%H1299>forth<s%> <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them: shoot <S%H7971>out<s%> thine <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them.

Send <S%H7971><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>above;<s%> <S%H4791><s%> <S%H6475>rid<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4480>waters,<s%> <S%H4325><s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%>
Whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H8267>falsehood.<s%>

I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> unto thee, O <S%H430>God:<s%> upon a <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and an instrument of ten <S%H6218>strings<s%> will I sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thee.

It is he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> unto <S%H4428>kings:<s%> who <S%H6475>delivereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> from the <S%H7451>hurtful<s%> <S%H4480>sword.<s%> <S%H2719><s%>

Rid <S%H6475><s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and their right <S%H3225>hand<s%> is a right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of falsehood: <S%H8267><s%>

That <S%H834><s%> our <S%H1121>sons<s%> may be as <S%H5195>plants<s%> grown <S%H1431>up<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth;<s%> that our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> may be as corner <S%H2106>stones,<s%> <S%H2404>polished<s%> after the <S%H8403>similitude<s%> of a palace: <S%H1964><s%>

That our <S%H4200>garners<s%> may be <S%H4392>full,<s%> <S%H6329>affording<s%> all manner of <S%H4480>store:<s%> <S%H2177><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H2177><s%> that our <S%H6629>sheep<s%> may bring forth <S%H503>thousands<s%> and ten <S%H7231>thousands<s%> in our streets: <S%H2351><s%>

That our <S%H441>oxen<s%> may be strong to <S%H5445>labor;<s%> that there be <S%H369>no<s%> breaking <S%H6556>in,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%>; that there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6682>complaining<s%> in our <S%H7339>streets.<s%>

Happy <S%H835><s%> is that <S%H5971>people,<s%> that is in such a <S%H7945>case:<s%> <S%H3602><s%> yea, <S%H835>happy<s%> is that <S%H5971>people,<s%> whose <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H7945>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>
